DataElement.preferredName: Vaccine Injection Site Pain Swelling Erythema Or Pruritus Occurrence Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no indicator for whether the participant experiences any pain, swelling, redness, or itching at the vaccine injection site.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Vaccine Injection Site Swelling Erythema Pruritus Or Pain Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Preparations containing substances with antigenic properties administered to activate the immune system, thereby inducing an immune response._The anatomic site at which a medication or a vaccine is injected._Enlargement; expansion in size; sign of inflammation_Red discoloration of the skin caused by infectious agents, inflammation, drug hypersensitivity, or underlying disease._An intense itching sensation._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._The sensation of discomfort, distress, or agony, resulting from the stimulation of specialized nerve endings._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Preparations containing substances with antigenic properties administered to activate the immune system, thereby inducing an immune response.:The anatomic site at which a medication or a vaccine is injected.

Concepts.definition: Preparations containing substances with antigenic properties administered to activate the immune system, thereby inducing an immune response.
The anatomic site at which a medication or a vaccine is injected.

Property.preferredName: Swelling Erythema Pruritus Or Pain Occurrence
Property.preferredDefinition: Enlargement; expansion in size; sign of inflammation:Red discoloration of the skin caused by infectious agents, inflammation, drug hypersensitivity, or underlying disease.:An intense itching sensation.:An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:The sensation of discomfort, distress, or agony, resulting from the stimulation of specialized nerve endings.:An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

Concepts.definition: Enlargement; expansion in size; sign of inflammation
Red discoloration of the skin caused by infectious agents, inflammation, drug hypersensitivity, or underlying disease.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
The sensation of discomfort, distress, or agony, resulting from the stimulation of specialized nerve endings.
An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 2/3/2017 created for DCP NWU SVAR, wz.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
